title: Zeus Theme (Visual Studio Code Extension)
summary: A visually appealing VS Code theme extension that enhances coding readability and developer experience.
achievements: Enhanced coding experience by improving readability with visually appealing themes.
Published "Zeus Theme" on the Visual Studio Code Marketplace, receiving positive feedback.

images.alt: Zeus Theme extension in VS Code Marketplace

description.content: Zeus Theme is a Visual Studio Code extension designed to enhance the coding experience through carefully crafted color schemes that improve readability and reduce eye strain during long coding sessions.

The theme was developed using Node.js and the Yeoman CLI for scaffolding, with a focus on creating a balanced color palette that highlights syntax without being distracting. The extension has been published on the Visual Studio Code Marketplace and has received positive feedback from users.
Key features of the Zeus Theme include:

items.text: Carefully selected color palette for optimal contrast and readability
Special attention to syntax highlighting for popular programming languages
Dark and light variants to suit different environments and preferences
Custom UI elements that complement the syntax highlighting

description.content: This project demonstrates my ability to create developer tools that enhance productivity and user experience, as well as my understanding of the importance of visual design in development environments.
